maple: A055253 := proc(val) local i, j, k, n; n := 2^val; j := 0; k := floor(ln(n)/ln(10))+1; for i from 1 to k do if (n mod 10) mod 2 = 0 then j := j+1 fi; n := floor(n/10); od; RETURN(j); end: seq(A055253(n),n=0..110); # _Jaap Spies_, Dec 30 2003
